benefits.title: Connect with other resonators.
benefits.problem: Easily find friends to go to concerts with.
benefits.solution: Resonance suggests users who attended similar events.

benefits.title: Experience live music.
benefits.problem: Find events near you and catered towards your tastes.
benefits.solution: See trending concerts and shows your friends are going to.

benefits.title: Discover.
benefits.problem: See trending artists and their creative content.
benefits.solution: Like and share posts from ongoing concerts.
